summary: This is a memorandum documenting a voluntary interview conducted by the DOJ Office of the Inspector General with a Lieutenant from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The interview was recorded and transcribed, and the report includes several attachments such as assignment rosters and count documentation from August 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate whose death is the subject of the OIG investigation. He was housed at MCC New York with register number 76318-054.

persons.name: Ryan Geach
persons.context: Prepared the memorandum and conducted the interview. Listed as the preparer and reviewer.

events.title: OIG Interview of MCC Lieutenant
events.description: Senior Special Agent Ryan Geach and another Special Agent conducted a voluntary interview of an MCC New York Lieutenant at his residence in Deer Park, New York, regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: MCC Assignment Roster and Count
events.description: Daily assignment roster and 4 p.m. count documentation from MCC New York, likely related to Epstein's incarceration period.

events.title: MCC Assignment Roster and Count
events.description: Daily assignment roster and 12 a.m. count documentation from MCC New York, likely related to Epstein's incarceration period.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted a voluntary interview with an MCC New York Lieutenant regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.
The interview was recorded and transcribed, and occurred at the Lieutenant's residence in Deer Park, New York on June 14, 2021.
The Lieutenant was the Special Housing Unit Lieutenant when Epstein was housed at MCC New York.
Attachments include MCC New York daily assignment rosters and count documentation from August 9 and 10, 2019.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum and contains neither recommendations nor conclusions.
